attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!! DONT DOWNLOAD!!
attributes.review: This app took literally 9 days to download and every few minutes I would run out of storage so I had to constantly delete certain thing and it was getting on my nerves!!! As soon as it was done downloading it whipped all of my data out and then it overheated my phone and almost exploded my phone just because of how long it had to download. NEVER IN MY LIFE HAVE I HAD TO DEAL WITH THIS!!! This is the worst experience ever!!!! Then as soon as I got my phone repaired I had to put in ALL MY CONTACTS and REINSTALL EVERYTHING EVEN THIS APP AND IT TOOK A WEEK TO FULLY PROCESS!!! NEVERRRRR INSTALL THIS!!!! DONT DO IT IM WARNING YOU!!

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and I immediately got eye cancer. It must have been the vibrant orange glow that caused it. My dog was looking over my shoulder and immediately died. It caused me to be an only child and then an orphan. All I have left is my pet duck, but due to my terminal eye cancer I will have to find a new home for my duck. I‚Äôve never been more depressed and I hope that no other person would download it because of all the pain and suffering it has cause me. If only I could give negative stars. Please do not download the app. It will ruin your life like it did mine.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP DO NOT GET

I need to be productive someone please help.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: I downloaded this app, and I immediately knew something was wrong. My phone heated up the 1000 degrees, and seared the skin off my hand. I had to go to the ER because of that. It gave me 300 notifications per minute, and broke my phone. Once I got everything under control, I opened the app again, and my phone started playing Replay on full volume. Then, since it was linked to my tv, my tv shattered, and I got cut by the glass. Soon enough, black Beatles started playing, and I couldn‚Äôt move for 4:53 minutes! I would NOT recommend this app for anyone.
